short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly copy text, enable right-click, and remove restrictions on websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of websites restricting your ability to copy text or use right-click?
EnableCopy is here to put you back in control of your browsing experience. This lightweight, easy-to-use extension removes content restrictions and restores key browser functionalities for seamless web interactions.

Key Features:

▪️ Unblock Right-Click & Context Menu: Access right-click menus on restricted websites.
▪️ Enable Text Selection: Copy text from any webpage, even those with copy restrictions.
▪️ Seamless Toggle: Easily enable or disable the extension for specific websites.
▪️ Lightweight & Fast: Built to work efficiently without slowing down your browser.
▪️ Privacy-Focused: No tracking or data collection—your browsing stays private.

Why Choose EnableCopy?

EnableCopy is designed for anyone who values ease of access and productivity. Whether you’re a student, researcher, or just someone frustrated by unnecessary restrictions, EnableCopy helps you regain full control.

How It Works:

▪️ Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
▪️ Activate it with a single click.
▪️ Enjoy unrestricted access to text copying, selection, and right-click menus.

Say goodbye to frustration and hello to freedom—download EnableCopy now!
